website_summaries.verdict: Ample track space, an elevator, landing pad, numerous moving parts and more, this is sure to inspire hours of imaginative play for young car enthusiasts.
pros: At more than 3-feet tall when assembled and room to fit 40-plus cars, this Hot Wheels garage is not only the largest in the brand's family, but offers numerous options for fun in the multi-tiered structure
cons: Comes with a climbing gorilla that is known to malfunction
The priciest option on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Cars won't fall off if you follow the Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews. For the people who complained about cars not staying on, you didn't follow the instructions carefully. When I first put it together, I slightly followed them, but was sure "I had it" when I just attached the tracks. When the cars wouldn't stay on, and yet they did when someone else had previously put it together, I realized it does in fact matter where each track is attached. So follow the instructions carefully. Otherwise, awesome toy. My 4.5 year old loves it. We keep it out for awhile and then we take it apart and put it away for awhile. It is like having a new toy when we pull it out again. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Coconutdancer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations but Wow! If set up level, with supports centered, this thing really works! Got it for 2 granddaughters, ages 2 and 4. They are able to easily feed cars onto the track and are thrilled by the numbers of loops they can get before they jymp track. They are not into the crash aspect, but instead keep track of which cars go longer or faster. I once counted 64 full laps before a car jumped track! Now, sometimes they jump track after 1 loop, but there are enough "long rides" to make my little girls squeal in delight! Thousand of loops are on the 1st set of batteries too!
customer_reviews.author: JPFSquared

customer_reviews.title: TT hit the Jackpot when she purchase this
customer_reviews.text: My nephew love this it’s so hard to find a good toy for a boy but there is tons of great toys for girls I searched and search and came across this hot wheels crash track and it was perfect for him he was so excited to get his new toy and good thing I purchase the extra set of cars because my nieces enjoyed it as well
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Happy 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who just turned 4 as a birthday gift. I was a little apprehensive when reading other comments and this being our very first Hot Wheels track, but I'm happy to say my little guy loves this. He will sit and play with this for countless amounts of time. The cars do tend to crash together and fly off as others mentioned, but that is what the toy is meant to do. I think for my son that is the best part! He squeals with delight when they crash and he gets to pick them up and put them back in the track. Super exciting & fun!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kid, but not good for parents sanity: very loud moter
customer_reviews.text: Requires 4 D sized batteries. My son seems to like it. Pros: You get a lot for your money. With hotwheels, it can feel like you paid for a couple of pieces of track and a car. Overpriced. My 5 year old really enjoys playing with it and it crashes well. Cons: Whilst on, the motor is incredible LOUD! This is not a toy that can be played with in a normal setting. It is a constant, and quite annoying loud sound. Louder than a remote control car, but quieter than an airplane. If you don't mind a LOT of noise, this toy is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun, loud, rowdy toy!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, this thing is fast! A grandparent bought it for my three year old (almost four year old) son. He is a little intimidated by the speed of the cars. When cars crash, they crash HARD! They sometimes fly out of the race track so you have to be paying attention. He’s getting the hang of it now but he knows where the off switch is too! It does damage the hot wheels over time so I wouldn’t recommend putting any valuable or sentimental hot wheels on it. It can be noisy, the more cars, the higher volume of noise. It does what it says it does though and my kids love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Mom

customer_reviews.title: Died on day #32
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and even I was amazed how multiple cars stayed on the curves at the amazing speeds! However, the track stopped working 32 days after receiving it. Worked great on night #31 but the morning of day #32 it wouldn't turn on. Thinking it may be the batteries (but seriously doubting) I purchased replacement batteries, but to our son's disappointment it would still not turn on. The rubber wheels that launch the cars around the track act like they want to turn for a split second but nothing afterwards. Too bad we're past the return date because this track was fun and did what it said it would do for a while...
customer_reviews.author: J. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Soooo much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so much fun! Got it for our Millie’s 10th birthday. She has Down’s Syndrome. She loves it! So do I and my wife and 17YO Elizabeth. I don’t find it too loud at all. Millie doesn’t like loud noises and she has no issues with this set. FAST paced exciting action. Would make a great gift for a child. Little parking spaces for 6 cars help keep things neat. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DH Walters

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas - Delivered w/ OUT Box on Front Porch
customer_reviews.text: I am so furious. This was a Christmas gift for my 5 year old. It was delivered WITH OUT a box and put on my snowy front porch. My son opened the door to find his soggy Christmas present. You absolutely ruined his Christmas surprise. I am beyond ticked. You need to warn parents that this will be delivered without an outterbox. You will ruin a lot of surprises.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Talk about making 6 year old boys (AND their 8 year old sisters) happy --they spend a LONG time trying to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest Hot Wheels ANYTHING I have ever seen. Talk about making 6 year old boys (AND their 8 year old sisters) happy --they spend a LONG time trying to get the cars to time just right, and they spend just as much time finding cars that are just perfect for the high speed track -- I am 50 and I still think this is cool. Much of the newer Hot Wheels items have not held the interest of our kids, but this does. Cool, compact (relative to most Hot Wheels "nothing-else-can-go-in-the-room-while-this-is-here" items), and a thrill for the kids.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Batteries didn’t even last a month. It’s take 4 Ds. The batteries don’t even die. They simply become too weak to propel the car(s). I think my 4 year old might play with it between 15-30 mins at a time. I make sure to shut if off or have him shut it off when he’s finished. If I had to guess how much adequate runtime, I’d estimate between 2-4 hours. Don’t get this is you hate loud toys. Lol. It’s got to be the loudest one we own. The noise doesn’t bother me. Not all cars work. If it’s too light, it falls off the track. The concept is cool And fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amit&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s loud but you know what?!? it’s awesome and it’s worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this track. Yes it is a bit noisy, yes it takes a lot of batteries, yes it is big and takes a lot of space. BUT if your kid is a fan of hot wheels, crashing, cars zooming around and fun explosions than this track IS for you. This is got to be one of our favorites. It allows for hours of entertainment with my son. He absolutely adores this track! And even though it’s noisy, I don’t care - I mean come on!! Children are noisy -as they should be! Especially when they’re having a blast! Parents were too picky about this Need a reality check. Let kids be kids for crap sake!
customer_reviews.author: KeriLynn

customer_reviews.title: amazing but...also a little scary
customer_reviews.text: Okay so first of all this toy is everything my 4 year old has been dreaming of. This will entertain him for hours. The only downside is that it is SO FAST. It’s a little dangerous honestly lol. The first car that flew off the track flew right off and hit my son in the lip. 🤦🏻‍♀️ So while I totally recommend ordering it I don’t recommend the kids playing with it unsuoervised. I’m a little concerned about what could happen to their little fingers if they tried to get a car out of the way of the belt path while it was on. But, other than that it’s amazing and was the perfect gift for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for toy for my son who is five yrs old and in love with hot wheels, good toy, the plastic is thin and flexible which is perfect for the function of this toy, and I have to say that my son really enjoys playing with it, the batteries are not included which might cause a problem if you want to gift it ,it is easy to assemble and on the big size which takes space, my complaint is that it is loud which may cause a problem if you have a baby or you have recurring headaches, also the supporting columns keep falling a part and my son needs me to fix them each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this track. We purchased it for his birthday and finally got needed batteries and set it up. He was really enjoying seeing the cars crash and was amazed at how fast they zoomed. It was definitely worth the money. The instructions we're easy to follow and it was a simple assembly that took maybe 10 minutes to complete. The package was delivered on time and packaged well .
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Got this because of great reviews before Christmas. But like other reviewers after Christmas, this isn't working right. They must have changed something. Car wouldn't get farther than 1st loop before falling off. We even took it apart and put it together again, trying it on hard floor as well as carpet, trying other hot wheel cars, new batteries. Nothing worked. Had to return it, sadly. Would've been great if it'd worked.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this! As we are cleaning out for Christmas, we came across this from my son’s January birthday. It worked great for a short short amount of time. The tracks pop off the base and are very difficult to attach. This is very poorly designed and I am frustrated that I bought it in November of 2018 for my son’s January birthday and couldn’t get a refund. Not to mention that this was his big present which turned out to be junk. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just junk.
customer_reviews.text: My son was dreaming to have this toy for a whole year. I waited and bought it on sale this past Black Friday for an amazing steal! I was so happy to get it for him! His face was priceless when he got it this Christmas. He had lots of fun playing with it and he didn’t play with everyday it was every other day. Now in less than a month, the curved pieces are pure junk! Two of them broke! They broke where they attach and they cannot be repaired. So disappointed. It lasted a few weeks and my son is sad it cannot be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: mamabearx2

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 10 minutes, but Mattel came through!
customer_reviews.text: Toy was great fun and the kids were having a blast with it for exactly 10 minutes. After that one of the ramps broke off, snapped at the connector point. After that the whole thing was no longer useable. Disappointing to say the least! Update: called Mattel and the customer service was terrific! They sent a replacement part at not charge with 2-Day shipping. My son loves this track and it’s his favorite toy he received this holiday season. I left it at three stars because it really shouldn’t have broken so quickly to begin with. Bravo Mattel for superior service!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year son loves this. Very easy to put together. Requires 4 D batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Loni Carter

customer_reviews.title: Provides hours of entertainment - as long as you don't mind the noise.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to surprise my 4 year old son and it has been enjoyed by all members of our (large) family. We didn't realize it would need batteries or how loud it would be, however, we had hoped to provide our son with entertainment that didn't involve a screen (tv, game console, tablet etc) and it has definitely delivered! It is best used with only hot wheels vehicles as some of the others do not fit properly, so if you have several types of die cast cars you would want to pre-select the hot wheels options for use with this track system. Would recommend for ages 4 to 12 as long as you are ok with some noise :)
customer_reviews.author: Andy Girl 81

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves hot wheels. He and his 4 year old brother really love this item. I didn't think it would be as big of a hit as it is, but they both like playing with it and in the past three weeks have played with it about 5 times a week. It's a lot of fun to watch the cars crash into each other, even for me. I will say that cars that are lower to the ground work best (i.e. go fastest), and it is pretty loud when it is working. I'm ok with that though. I know some people are not.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Basic

customer_reviews.title: One of the best toys I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson, and he has used it continually for hours. It made me so happy that he was so happy. Only criticism I have, is that one of the main reasons I purchased this product was the film that was used to advertise the product on the page. The film shows the two boys playing with eight cars, but unknowing to us, the product only comes with one car. I found Hot Wheels cars at Walgreens being sold 2 for $2.00 and they are labeled best for track racing. So that is how that problem was resolved. All in all, we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Idk what’s w the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed w hot wheels so I got him this for his birthday. I usually don’t write reviews but there’s so many bad ones in here I need to counter it. First off OF COURSE it’s loud. Most kids toys are. What do you expect from a track w motors to propel cats forward?! I saw some reviews about the cars falling off the track and we’ve not experienced any of that thus far. Also saw some saying that the cars crashed into each other. That’s literally the point. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina A

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas present for our four year old son. I thought it would be a pain to put together, but it was pretty easy. Our son LOVES it. He started with one car zooming around the track, and ended up getting four at a time to zoom around. It gets pretty loud, between the zooming of the cars and the battery powered part of the track that moves the cars, but that's expected. It's a lot of fun, and different from the other race track he has. This is a fun toy, and I think he'll get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Work like it's says.
customer_reviews.text: OK I'm an old man and I got it for me. Adult assembly required. Like other reviews have said this set requires very careful following of instructions. Even a sticker out of place can make a car jump track. Yes it matters the cars you run on it. Hot wheels cars with doors. Car with running boards or fenders that stick out can not be gripped properly by the rotors. That means most Hot Wheels cars will work. I actually have fun running and crashing the cars. Takes 4 D batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor JAM

customer_reviews.title: Know when its dinner time!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing here not to like. Brother, mother, father will be having too much fun to stop. Well built for everlasting fun. Supports if broken as mentioned in other reports can easily be taped or repaired. Ours have not faulted once! I suggest that if assembled properly and maybe situated on a board like your trains would be then it would be very stable. Takes the turns incredibly fast and the car left on track is the WINNER!! ZOOM ZOOM Will keep your boys busy for quite some time but does have an elevated noise level. Well built, does not include "C" batteries and only 2 cars which can be purchased along with other items later.
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old loves this toy. He frequently wakes up and wants to play Hot Wheel Cars. It's very easy to put together and operate. The side supports do get knocked easily but it's a quick fix. I will say it's rather noisy and I am thankful we have a playroom to put it in. Not all cars work on the track but we find that part of the fun trying to see which cars will last on the track the longest. I would reccomend this for any child with a love of cars and destruction.
customer_reviews.author: STS-hill

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy. Nearly all of my son's hot wheels cars work on this track. The batteries don't drain very fast & he loves watching the cars smash into each other. We've had this for well over a year and it is still working great! It does take up a fair amount of floor space though, probably around 2 1/2 square feet. It isn't something that you'd take apart and put together every time you want to play with it. But if you don't mind that, then this is a great toy & worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with these toys but I will say I just became his best grandpa(Santa) Played for hours. Took it home and the next day his mom sent me a video showing he and his sister playing and said some friends came over and the 2 dads played with it. GREAT HIT!!
customer_reviews.author: R K.

customer_reviews.title: Probably Their Best Track - Lightweight Cars Only
customer_reviews.text: Really cool. Works best with the car or comes with and very light weight cars (will not work well with heavier hot wheel cars. Assembly isn't all that bad, everything is labeled where to put it. Really powerful in shooting the cars around, can go on for minutes, batteries last pretty long too, had it on for about 20 minutes of play time, still going strong (with Duracells).
customer_reviews.author: Mattaku

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it but not as much as other hot wheel tracks. This track does not easily connect with the other track we bought. With some witty ideas (as kids have) you may be able to connect and set up things so it doesn’t fall, but I don’t feel you should have to do this. Either way they use it here and there
customer_reviews.author: Duane Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great when parts are in good shape; critical parts a flimsy; not great for all Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The pair of "hooks" on the bottom of each track are flimsy. If the hooks loosen, the tracks no longer snugly connect to the base and this can cause cars to become unstable and crash. Even when the toy is brand new, certain cars will never drive well due to a variety of factors, e.g. weight, size, resistance to rolling. Some cars will drive great. I don't recommend this for kids who treat the toy roughly.
customer_reviews.author: Max Jenius

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay intact
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted a race track and got this one from Santa. He loves it, but unfortunately, it does not stay put together; the feet on it keep toppling over. It is a cool toy, but my 4 year old gets very frustrated playing with it and I have to keep adjusting it. If it is not placed perfectly, the car does not go properly on the track. Perhaps Santa should have looked for a different race track.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and epic carnage
customer_reviews.text: Everything a 6 year old boy loves. Hot wheels and lots of crashing. This is a really fun set. Once you sticker it up and figure out the bad drawing instructions it is good fun. My son loved sticking cars onto the track and usually after the 3rd or 4th they would smack together in a satisfying crash. With 4 crash zones you are sure to get some "epic carnage." It says it links together with other tracks but that is only in one spot, the intake track. Anything else would mess up the closed circuit that is required to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I followed the instructions carefully, double-checked my work and somehow cannot get any of our MANY hot wheels cars of various shapes to go through the loops. Our best car goes through two loops before it falls off. Forget about the cars going continuously around and crashing in the center. The plastic is very flimsy and it seems our tracks are deformed. The "stabilizers" just float in the air, nowhere near the ground. Even if we force them onto the ground the track still does not work as advertised. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Max Gutfeld

customer_reviews.title: Wear earplugs for sanity.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my 6yr old grandson. He thought it was amazing and played with it for quite some time. Tried so if his hot wheel cars, trucks and even an English bus. If course not all worked on this track. After about 3 minutes I had enough "whoosh, whoosh sound" and left for quite with the 2 year old. Played for 3 days then left for his home. Mom and dad left the toy with us. Oh joy.
customer_reviews.author: kolmon kormondy

customer_reviews.title: Brings back memories
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my nephew. He loves it. I remember having one as a child and even got it out to see if it still works. The old one (from the 90s) is noticeable more powerful. This one the motors struggle to send certain cars all the way around the track sometimes and they'll get stuck at the top of the loop or just roll off the track from lack of speed. That being said still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's 5th birthday and to say she loves it is an understatement. She has lots of cars but didn't have anything like this. We have alot of fun - even the dog thinks it's a challenge. The most we have been able to race is 4 cars at once. Easy to assemble and not a million. stickers like some of them.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Chicago

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was the highlight of my grandchildren's Christmas. I always wanted one of these as a kid ,so naturally i get one for them ;) they loved it played all night and eventually my daughter in law sent me a picture of them all asleep next to it,the cars still zooming around the track.worth every penny that and a pack of 9 hotwheels cars and you are all set!the good thing is you can add track and other stuff to this ,so birthday time comes they are getting more tracks
customer_reviews.author: aaron unland

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, me.... not so much
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remembered!! Let me say that if it was up to the kids this would get 5 stars!! They love playing with it. However if you buy it get ready! It pretty damn loud, sucks the life out of those D batteries pretty quickly, and you need to have a place to keep it setup. It’s pretty big and you don’t want to have to disassemble it every time you play.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Waters

customer_reviews.title: Buy an extra car
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this toy is that only the car that comes with it really works. If you put any other hot wheels cars on it, it crashes really fast and doesn’t want to stay on. Even the ones that look most like the car it comes with. Other than that, my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Waugh

customer_reviews.title: my twins loved it
customer_reviews.text: its good toy to have for kids if they into hot wheels . my 5 year twins loves it. It does make the noise. Batteries are expensive and run out fast. They should have rechargeable batteries or 6 volt DC adapter as an options. Ones assembled it does take quite bit space. I wish they can also have box which you can dissemble and store this.
customer_reviews.author: sachin

customer_reviews.title: Know your kid!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool set easy-to-assemble works just like it's supposed to! The cars go very fast and numerous cars can be put in the system at once. It is actually amusing to watch BUT my kids like creative toys. So they played with this for not even a full day and then it was just taking up ALOT of space. Not to mention 50 bucks down the drain. If your child truly loves Hot Wheels, it's probably worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Prince Michael

customer_reviews.title: So fun for kids and their dads!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old got this for Christmas. He loves it!! I was hesitant bc of some if the negative reviews but am glad we bought it. He and his dad worked on putting it together. Once it was ready, I honesty couldn’t tell who was having more fun. They test different race cars to see which ones do the best and put on shows for the rest of us! Huge win in my book! I imagine this is just the beginning of our hot wheel track days! Make sure you have plenty of D batteries on hand!
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Fast and exciting!
customer_reviews.text: Our four year old loves this toy. It's very fast, exciting and safe. It's pretty dang cool how the center mechanism launches the cars. I get a kick out of watching how they just miss each other at high speeds. It must have taken quite a while to engineer this toy. The kids have spent hours playing with it. It takes up a fair amount of space and it has to be perfectly level, so we'll have to take in down periodically, but that's how we use many of their toys to keep them interesting anyway. Once you put it together, it's easy to put it back together the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son since he lost the pieces to his last one, and finally got it about two weeks later & the day before I could request a refund. I don’t think the fact that it didn’t come with batteries should maybe be visible in the pictures. I assumed it would need regular AA but you need FOUR D batteries. So after waiting two weeks for the track, I get to wait for the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my grandson last night.He love this track. Super easy to put together. I don't know who loved it more him or his dog..lol The cars go super fast.You have to watch which cars you use on it though.I guess the weight of Carr has something to do with them staying on track and make sure legs of track are even on floor.. All and all he is seven and loved this..
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Toy Ever
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year-old loves this hot wheel set immediately. We have been having so much fun with racing cars using it. There is one free car that came with the package and it was a pretty one. The only shortcoming is that there was no battery inlcuded with the set, and it needs 4 D-sized battery to run. Wish that I have noticed that and bought battery together to avoid a trip to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Game Ever
customer_reviews.text: My son, who was on the verge of turning 5, got this for Christmas. We played with it for hours! Adults and kids will enjoy this track. He had a ball trying to figure out which cars he should put on the track first because of their weight. It doesn't just pass time, it can be a great tool for problem solving. Everyone wants to get as many cars on the track as they can BUT when they crash it's epic. The cars do go flying high. Make sure everyone watches their fingers. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I’d Move On and Search for Something Else.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is AWFUL. It’s a pain to get together (I mean it’s not rocket science but certainly not convenient). Once it’s up and running it is SO flimsy. After some “go arounds” you’ll have to try bending the tracks and such. I’ll save you time: That is the beginning of the end. PLUS, the whole “crash” and 1+ person just isn’t true. No crash and made for one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: This toy simply doesn't work. Tried with brand new batteries and 20+ hot wheel cars, we can barely get any cars to complete one or two loops before falling off the track. 90% of the time, the cars don't make it over one loop. We adjusted the legs, loops to see if it would make any difference and it did not. Going back!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: D batteries x4 separate!! Only one car and they’re very specific.
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the video shows and easy to assemble. Make sure you buy 4 “D” batteries or you’ll be making an extra trip to the store. Only comes with one car so the video is deceitful. You’ll have to buy more cars and only specific cars will work. Good luck finding them. The cars that work are lighter and lower profile, and you won’t find them in a simple search. You Atleast get to watch one car on the track until you can locate more.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Hot Wheels Set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for kids in to cars and Hot Wheels. Absolutely mesmerized by the frantic around and around until the inevitable collision! Stock up on the heavy duty D batteries (not included), this beast takes 4 to keep those motors going. Surprisingly easy to assemble even for someone who loves to ignore instructions. This set will be getting heavy use for a long time — from the adults too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love for young boys with this thing. It basically is a really fast and fun way to continually crash cars and to see which cars can stay on the track at high speeds. The cars go around in a clover leaf shaped track getting propelled at high speed each time to come back to the center. Put two or more cars on the track and watch them crash... really that's the point of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer for a really long time

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this. It’s tons of fun and lots of laughter watching and waiting for the cars to smash into each other. Only ‘complaint’ per se is the usual issue of needing to find just the right size and weight cars to fit and stay in the track. Oddly enough the car that came with the set didn’t work on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and quick fun for all ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is two thumbs up (four if you include mine and my son’s thumbs). Super easy to put together and quick fun for all ages (four year old loves it, baby brother likes to watch, big cousins, uncle, dad and even grandpa are entertained!). Some of the odd-size cars or cars with low profile and exposed wheels don’t work- but it is fun to try and watch everything crash. One downfall- it’s like 30” wise (or more) and it doesn’t dismantle easily- so it takes up a good amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally stops working?
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 10 minutes, then mysteriously stopped working. We initially couldn’t get it to turn back on. I wasabpjt to go through the process of returning it when it suddenly started working again. My kids love the toy and I like it, too, I’m just a little nervous that it’s going to stop functioning again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: This is the loudest toy I have ever experienced...
customer_reviews.text: I have two late teenage sons and we bought this for my 6 year old. All three actually enjoy it. It’s a very cool toy but I’m worried that this thing could cause hearing loss when the cars are on the track. It’s that loud. I work in a factory that requires ear plugs to be used for noise levels way lower than this toy emits. Be cautious - you only have one set of ears!!!
customer_reviews.author: DavidM

customer_reviews.title: Brings joy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. I bought this for my 5-year old son as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loves it (credit goes only to Santa though). He enjoys playing with several Hot Wheels cars at the same time trying to arrange the order in a way they don't crash into each other while moving at great speeds. My two-year old son (along with grandpa) also loves the set when he is allowed to play. So fat I bought only one pack of batteries and surprisingly they still work. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Avto

customer_reviews.title: Horrible track.....
customer_reviews.text: This car track is horrible and cars fall off every 2 laps not to mention you have to have "special hot wheels cars" for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mykky

customer_reviews.title: An expensive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way all of the five star reviews on this track can be accurate. The cars won’t even make it around a single loop. A very expensive disappointment. We returned it. I didn’t pay that much money for a track that the cars won’t even stay on for even one loop.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give this toy low score is the loud noise. Prepare yourself to get headache, if you are sensitive to noise. This was bar far the noisiest toy I have even seen. I hate the fact it needs those big batteries. When it arrived my son was so disappointed since batteries wasn’t included.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. My son loved it. Sometimes I find myself a bit nervous that my son will get his fingers pinched between cars but after persistent reminders he’s become more careful. The only negative I have for this track is that it runs on 4 D size batteries. It would be much nicer if it could plug in to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pares

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one of these for decades, finally bought one for my 5 year old. We have a bunch of tracks and loops and cars, this thing takes out all the fun of building race tracks. It eats batteries like crazy, no ac adapter. It's OK, but I wish I had just bought individual boosters to use inline with tracks we design.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Seems cool in theory
customer_reviews.text: You really have to ask yourself, how long can you watch cars race around in circles? Also consider the fact that it is not quite and will burn through batteries rather quickly. Needless to say, it spends more time in the box at the top of the closet than on the floor being used.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Maniac

customer_reviews.title: Car falls off constantly. Forget about even trying multiple cars.
customer_reviews.text: The car never makes it through the track. Complete trash! I’ve tried more than 30 other hot wheels cars and none of then work. It is a disappointment every time my son turns it on. It is assembled exactly as described in the manual. Avoid getting this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Fiscella

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the criss cross track as a Christmas present & it didn't work. Amazon quickly saved the day by contacting Santa & having one sent to us a few days later. It works fabulously & my 5 yr old loves it. It was easy to assemble & the kids (& men) in the family love it. It is pretty noisy however, that's what makes a toy great to a child right? Thank you for being such good Elves Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase. My boy’s loved it and I loved playing with them. We kept trying to see how many cars we could get on the track before they all crashed. Or we would each have a car and who’s ever stayed on the longest wins. Hours of fun. Bad thing is, it is extremely loud!
customer_reviews.author: Christina U

customer_reviews.title: Criss Cross Crash set
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was super excited to open his track set. It was super easy to build and once set up it was super fun to watch the cars on the track. My nephew is into crashing cars and this is the perfect gift, I know the age group is from 5 years old but my nephew is 4 and he really loves it. I would advice to purchase more hotwheels cars. to enjoy the crashing experience. Overall, it was worth the money and it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Perinon

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but kids excitement/laugh louder!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old and he loved it. He plays with it often. Should have a auto inactive shut off switch to save batteries, but probably drive price up. Exciting and engaging toy for a few kids, but loud from product noise and kids excitement/laughter.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Sweet track so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so fun! My son has already ran the batteries down twice since Christmas. He has so much fun adding cars until they crash. He literally went through all 400 cars to determine that the car in the package was indeed the fastest. It took us hours but we had a blast
customer_reviews.author: CS in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy but watch your fingers
customer_reviews.text: Really cool toy. Even the adults couldn't stop playing with it. I bought it for my 5 year old for the holidays. Make sure that they watch their fingers though because the cars go really fast and which crash into your hands when you go grab a car that flipped over and is stuck on the track. Especially watch younger children who will put their hands on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: They need to fix the track stand
customer_reviews.text: Boys love it! Kept playing with it for hours. Try hundreds cars on the track. The only thing I don't like is the track stands. It just fell off again and again. Once the stand was off, the track broke. Kids got upset. Hope the manufacturer could come up with a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: A Worthy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found this! Was looking for a good gift for my son's birthday and he loves cars so we decided to purchase a hot wheels track. This product was made very well and does it's job, it keeps us all occupied. My son loves sitting in front of it dropping in car after car to see how many he can get on the track before they crash. I would recommend this to any child that likes cars it will keep them entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Love It!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $50
customer_reviews.text: A couple of issues: 1) Does not come with 4x size D batteries 2) Propulsion area does not fit most hot wheels cars 3) Kids got bored of it after five minutes 4) Comes with only one car 5) Was $50; product should cost around $25 given all of the above
customer_reviews.author: ignite

customer_reviews.title: It's slightly noisy when operating but my child does very much enjoy crashing the cars
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent race track for the price. It's slightly noisy when operating but my child does very much enjoy crashing the cars. It is a must to purchase more Hot Wheel cars in addition to this set. The one (1) car the comes with the track is not enough to fully enjoy the race and crash aspect of Criss Cross Crash Track.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it worked properly
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this toy! Went through our box of a billion hotwheels cars and only one would do a full circuit round the track. We tried everything, adjusting surfaces, adjusting the track, changing batteries. Nothing left but to return item. If it worked properly it would be a super toy but my son bought it with his own money and I’m just not willing to settle for an almost good toy. He still like it even though it didn’t work lol
customer_reviews.author: MOMOFBOYS

customer_reviews.title: Five year old grandson LOVED IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was suggested by my daughter in law and she sure called it right! Easy to assemble - it sure kept our grandson's interest as well as many of those far older! It is on the loud side but other than that, it sure was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: L. Holzwarth

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for My Grandson and His Dad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this track for my four-year-old grandson. It comes with one hot wheels car so I purchased the twenty pack and a case for storage. There's no contest with just one car but starting four cars at once makes this track intense. This has turned out to be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Treismom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the lamest gift but honestly it’s pretty darn sturdy and it actually works! My 4 yo so and 6 yo daughter have played hours on this track. So far they’ve only been able to get 5 cars on. Keeps them busy and is fun for the adults too
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome track! So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This track is easy to assemble, easy to move all together, and is so much fun for everyone! My 3 year old grandson is thoroughly enjoying it...and so are his mom and dad! It’s not compact, but doesn’t take up a lot of room which makes my daughter-in-law happy!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this hot wheels track for your kids and even I have a blast with it
customer_reviews.text: This hot wheels clover crash track is pretty awesome it deserves a five star review I left it; the motor is the most important thing you need to be worried about and it works way better than other hot wheels motors we own. The tracks are very well-built as are all hot wheels products the price point is pretty decent and it is well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: kevrock1

customer_reviews.title: Now its pretty much an expensive dust catcher since it didn't really ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a let down. The wheels didn't catch the cars very well and tended to cause more issues rather than work as intended. Now its pretty much an expensive dust catcher since it didn't really work. And I was using cars that works on another set that has a similar spinny launcher thing going on.
customer_reviews.author: avgjoegeek

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly
customer_reviews.text: I brought the track one: because I needed a gift for my 2 year old grandsons birthday and two: because I really wanted one growing up but never could stay out of trouble long enough to earn one 🤣 this product lived up to every expectation and my grandson loved it as well🤣😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Baylen Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for 6-8 year old kids
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple kids who love this track. 2 6yo boys, 7yo girl and 8yo boy, and younger ones love to sit and watch the action! The two 6 year olds were able to put it together themselves, and its been up for a few weeks, they love it. Great gift and nothing has broken yet. Best used with the indy style race cars.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We opened this up at my kiddo’s birthday party and were so disappointed. The box was previously opened and any instructions were missing. It wasn’t difficult to put together until we got to putting the supports for the tracks on. All 4 pieces that connect the supports to the track were missing making it nearly impossible to use. We had to deal with a very upset 5 year old as she tried to keep putting the car on just to have it fly off seconds later. If I wanted a used toy I would of went to a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this criss cross track for our son for his 4th birthday. Our 1 1/2 year old daughter loves it as well. I wish the track pieces would stay on a little better so I wasn't constantly assembling track sections, but that's due to having busy kids not the product itself. Great buy and one of the most used toys in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Cool set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son one year, and then bought another one for my nephew after that. The kids really enjoy smashing the cars, and it's fun for the adults too. :-)
customer_reviews.author: JJinNY

customer_reviews.title: we had a blast playing with it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and we had a blast playing with it.You only get one car with it so you'll need to by more if you don't already have extras. Yes, you can use the regular hot-wheels "cars" but only the cars and you will find specific ones stay on the track better than others. His mother (28) was having the most fun I think :-). Its kind of addicting to see how many cars you can keep going at once without crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Calguy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It did not meet my expectations. It was hard to put together and them it keeps coming apart. My grandson lost interest in it right away because it doesn't stay together and it doesn't sit on the legs as shown in the picture. The pieces that make up the track are not very flexible and keep popping apart and don't bend as they should. Very sad, that was the only thing he wanted for Christmas. He was disappointed and I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Really not a good product. you have to put aluminum foil between the batteries for them to make strong enough of a connection to actually work!!
customer_reviews.author: Carin Weatherly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOY!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not pay attention to the bad reviews ... this toy is AWESOME!!!! 3 year old son hasn’t stopped playing with it since he opened it, he’s obsessed!! The husband and I got really into it too, it’s a fun toy and makes the cars so super fast around the track. This toy has been on non stop for hours and my son has not lost interest in it. Tiny bit loud but most kids toys are and it’s really not that big of a deal. Perfect toy for a hot wheels loving toddler/child and definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: LOUD and didn’t hold my child’s attention
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be cooler than it is based on reviews . First of all- it is LOUD!!! Wasn’t expecting that. We set it up from “Santa” and decided to give it a test run to make sure it was working- yikes!! Had to shut it off quickly. My 6 year old was engaged for about 5 minutes and then was done. He hasn’t played with it since even though it was a toy he thought he really wanted
customer_reviews.author: KeMaRe20

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: What can you say it is hot wheels and you get to see them crash. My nephews loved this set I get them something they all share every year at christmas and this was said to be one of there favorites
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for our 5 year old grandson. He enjoyed the track and the cars. Most of his new cars worked well with this and did not fly off the track as often as other reviews remarked. It was a smart purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Teddie

customer_reviews.title: Superb gift for anyone who loves Hot Wheels.
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST gift I have given to my grandson. He loved it and I loved that he could play with his sister without fighting over whose present it was. He played for hours with it and went right back to play with it again every day. The only reminder I wish to share is don't forget to buy four D size batteries separately. Definitely a 5 star gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Legum

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 5 year old grandson. He loves it. So does his 8 year old brother. I love watching them play with it and seeing the joy on their faces as they figure out new tricks and actions. Assembly by their dad was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Granman

customer_reviews.title: Good fun so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, instant fun long as you have 4 d batteries one more car is all you really need ,I'm sure we will add on more tracks to it ,be careful tho cars can fly off track keep little ones faces away caught mine wanting to watch cars zoom by to close and they fly off hard and fast says good for 6 to 12 yrs not a thumbs down by any means just heads up
customer_reviews.author: Kappi

customer_reviews.title: Lots of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My kids received this as a Christmas gift over a year ago and they STILL play with it. Literally played with it today. It’s super loud but they are entertained for ages. Just need a few lightweight hot wheels cars and an endless supply of D batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Babb

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash Motorized Track Set, 4 High Speed Crash Zones, 4-Way Booster, 4 Loops, Includes 1 DieCast Vehicle, Ages 4 to 10 Years Old​
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingCrank up the competition with four intersecting crash zones and a car feeder ramp for challenging, high-octane action! Racers can line up their Hot Wheels cars and let 'em rip for near misses or total wipeouts. Drive kids' creativity and experimentation with more than 16 feet of track with hairpin turns, motorized boosters, and a giant crash zone. Crash-and-bash thrills unleash storytelling excitement and unlock imaginative play. The set includes parking spaces for additional storage and safeguards over crash zones. Comes with one Hot Wheels vehicle. Not for use with some Hot Wheels vehicles.
feature_bullets: Rev up your child's curiosity and problem-solving skills with this super-fun set!
Crank up the competition with challenging intersections, hairpin turns, motorized boosters, and a huge crash zone!
Car feeder ramp fuels exciting storytelling moments and continuous racing action.
Set features plenty of parking spaces for easy, convenient storage.
Includes one Hot Wheels vehicle for racing adventures right out of the box!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,159 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
